overview: Waqar Hasan brings 20 years experience in the Data and Internet areas, building high-energy organizations and delivering leading edge products delivered as software or operated as a service. During his five-year tenure at Yahoo! as Vice President of Data Systems, Waqar led and managed Yahoo!’s data platform that served all lines of business including Audience properties, Search and Brand advertising. Analyzing data from 500 million consumers, these remain among the largest-scale systems in the world, affect nearly all of Yahoo!’s revenue streams, and have substantially increased both monetization and consumer engagement.
